expo.name: patient-progress-app
expo.description:
Introducing Patient Progress, an app that would provide automated updates about the patientâ€™s recovery directly to the verified emergency contact, with date and time stamps.

To view our app: 
Download the Expo app from the app store (you don't need an Expo account).
Open the Expo app and click on "Scan QR code".
Scan the QR code provided on this page and it will load the Patient Progress app on your device.

If you experience persistent problems loading the app on your phone, you could click on the purple link to your right that says "Open project in the browser" and then click "Open project".

We recommend heading over to the repository (https://github.com/Juel07/patient-progress-app) to view the demo provided in the ReadMe.md file.
